S04bsu035_u:2267: ekaśca me putra priyamanāpaḥ grasta kaniṣṭho vanarākṣasena //
S04bsu035_u:2268: Suv_19.68 mā me imau anya ca dvau hi putra śokāgninā jīvitasaṃkṣayaṃ vrajet /
S04bsu035_u:2269: yannūna haṃ śīghra vrajeya tatra paśyeya putrau priyadarśanau tau //
S04bsu035_u:2270: Suv_19.69 śīghreṇa yānena ca rājadhānīṃ praveśayedrājakulānta śīghram /
S04bsu035_u:2271: mā eṣā māturhi janetu kāmaṃ śokāgninā taddhṛdaya sphaṭe tat //
S04bsu035_u:2272: Suv_19.70 putrau ca dṛṣṭvā labhate praśāntiṃ na jīvitenālabhate viyogam /
S04bsu035_u:2273: rājāpi cāmātyagaṇena sārdhaṃ dvipābhirūḍho gata tatra darśitu //
S04bsu035_u:2274: Suv_19.71 dṛṣṭvā ca putrau bhrātṛnāmāhvānau karuṇāsvaraṃ krandatau āttamānā /
S04bsu035_u:2275: rājā hi tatputradvayaṃ gṛhītvā prarodamānopi puraṃ vrajitvā /
S04bsu035_u:2276: sā śīghraśīghraṃ tvaramāna svaputrāṃ devīṃ adarśetsutaputrakāmām //
S04bsu035_u:2277: Suv_19.72 ahaṃ ca sa śākyamunistathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ mahāsattvavaro babhūva //
S04bsu035_u:2278: putraśca rājño hi mahārathasya yenaiva vyāghrī sukhitā kṛtāsīt //
S04bsu035_u:2279: Suv_19.73 śuddhodano hi varapārthivendro mahāratho nāma babhūva rājā /
S04bsu035_u:2282: vyāghrī abhūttatra mahāprajāpatī vyāghrīsutā pañcaka amī hi bhikṣavaḥ //
S04bsu035_u:2283_0: atha mahārā ā mahādevī va bahuvidhakaruṇāparidevanaṃ kṛtvā bharaṇānyevamucya mahato
S04bsu035_u:2283_1: anakāyena sārdhaṃ putrasya śarīrapū āṃ kṛtvāsminpradeśe tasya mahāsattvasyeme śarīrā
S04bsu035_u:2284: tatra devena mahāsattvenāsyai vyāghryā ātmabhāvaṃ parityaktam /
S04bsu035_u:2285: evaṃ rūpaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ karuṇayā kṛtam /
S04bsu035_u:2286: imaṃ mayā śarīrasya parideśanā 'nāgate 'dhvani gaṇanāsamatikrāntaiḥ kalpaiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ buddhakāyaṃ ca kāritā /
S04bsu035_u:2287: asmindeśane nirdiśyamāna aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sadevamānuṣikāyāḥ pra āyāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu035_u:2290: sa ca stūpo buddhādhiṣṭhānena tatraivāntardhānamanuprāpta iti //
S04bsu035_u:2296: upasaṃkramya tasya suvarṇaratnākaracchatrakūṭasya tathāgarasya pādau śirasā banditvaikānte sthitāni kṛtāñ alibhūtāni taṃ suvarṇaratnākaracchatrakūṭaṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭavitsuḥ //
S04bsu035_u:2301: Suv_20.3 brahmeśvaraṃ susvarabrahmaghoṣaṃ siṃheśvaraṃ gar itameghaghoṣam /
S04bsu035_u:2303: Suv_20.4 sunirmalaṃ suvimalate asuprabhaṃ puṇyaṃ śatalakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtaṃ inam /
S04bsu035_u:2305: Suv_20.5 paramasattvahitānukampanaṃ paramaṃ lokeṣu sukhasya dāyakam /
S04bsu035_u:2308: Suv_20.6 amṛtasya sukhasya dāyakaṃ maitrībalavīrya upāyavantam /
S04bsu035_u:2311: Suv_20.7 etatsaṃkṣiptaṃ mayā prakāśitaṃ kiṃ cidguṇabinduguṇārṇavodbhavam /
S04bsu035_u:2312: yacca samupacitapuṇyasaṃcayaṃ tena sattvaḥ prāpnyatu bodhimuttamām //
S04bsu035_u:2313_0: atha khalu ruciraketubodhisattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prāvaritvā dakṣiṃṇa
S04bsu035_u:2313_1: ānu maṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñ aliṃ praṇamayitvā tasyāṃ
S04bsu035_u:2314: Suv_20.8 sa tvaṃ munīndra śatapuṇyalakṣaṇa sahasraśrīcāruguṇairalaṃkṛtam /
S04bsu035_u:2318: Suv_20.10 na bhāsate va ramivendraparvatān prabhāvilāsābhiranantakoṭibhiḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2321: apūrvavarṇo vira o virā ase yathaiva muktaṃ bhramarākulaprabham //
S04bsu035_u:2326: Suv_20.13 tvayā hi prahlādakarī sukhaṃkarī śubhākaraṃ sarvasukhākarāgamam /
S04bsu035_u:2328: Suv_20.14 virā ase tvaṃ dyumaṇīrivāṃśubhiḥ yatho valaṃ tvaṃ gagaṇe 'rkamaṇḍalam /
S04bsu035_u:2331: dantāvaliste mukhato virā ate sadrā ahaṃsairiva cāntarīkṣam //
S04bsu035_u:2334: iti śrīsuvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarā e sarvatathāgatastavaparivarto nāma viṃśatitamaḥ //
S04bsu035_u:2338: atha khalu bodhisattvasaṃmuccayā nāma kuladevatā hṛṣṭatuṣṭā tasyaṃ velāyāmimābhirgāthābhirbhagavantaṃ tuṣṭāva //
S04bsu035_u:2339: Suv_21.1 namo 'stu buddhāya suviśuddhabodhaye viśuddhadharmā pratibhāmubuddhaye /
S04bsu035_u:2341: Suv_21.2 aho aho buddhamanakṣate asaṃ aho aho sāgaramerutulyam /
S04bsu035_u:2344: yena dṛśaṃ bhāṣita sūtramuttamaṃ sarveṣu sattvāmanugrahārtham //
S04bsu035_u:2345: Suv_21.4 śānteśvaraḥ śākyamunistathāgataḥ sattvottamaḥ śāntapure praviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2346: gambhīraśāstā vira ā samādhiḥ yadanupraviṣṭo inabuddhagocare //
S04bsu035_u:2347: Suv_21.5 śūnyāśca kāyāstatha śrāvakāṇāṃ vihāraśūnyā dvipadottamānām /
S04bsu035_u:2348: te sarvadharmāḥ prakṛtyā ca śūnyāḥ sattvāpi śūnyātma na ātu vidyate //
S04bsu035_u:2349: Suv_21.6 nityaṃ ca nityaṃ ca ina smarāmi nityaṃ ca śocāmi inasya darśanam /
S04bsu035_u:2350: satataṃ ca nityaṃ praṇidhiṃ karomi saṃbuddha sūryasya ca darśanārtham //
S04bsu035_u:2351: Suv_21.7 sthāpyeha nityaṃ dharaṇīṣu ānu atiśokatapto 'smi inasya darśane /
S04bsu035_u:2353: Suv_21.8 śokāgninā pra valito 'smi samanta nityaṃ dadāhi me darśanatoya śītalam /
S04bsu035_u:2355: Suv_21.9 kāruṇyabhāvaṃ kuru mahya nāyaka dadāhi me darśana saumyarūpaṃ /
S04bsu035_u:2356: tvayā hi trātā agadeva deśitaḥ śūnyāśca kāyastatha śrāvakāṇām //
S04bsu035_u:2358: sarve ca sattvāḥ supina svabhāvā mahāntaśūnyāḥ svaya nāyakasya //
S04bsu035_u:2360: sādhu sādhu te kuladevate śāstā dadāti sādhu te kuladevate punaśca sādhviti //
